message: Bob, I'm offering you this product at a price of $850,000. It's a fair price considering its value to both of us. Let me know what you think.
I appreciate your offer, Alice, but I was thinking more along the lines of $750,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, considering the value of the product to you.
Bob, I understand your perspective, but $750,000 is a bit too low for me.  I'm willing to come down a bit further, but $825,000 is my final offer. Let's meet in the middle and finalize this deal.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, so I'll offer $775,000. I think this is a fair price for both of us.
